title: Magnesium Threonate
description: 300-400mg of Magnesium L-Threonate or Bisglycinate 30-60 minutes before bed to promote relaxation and deep sleep.

title: Apigenin Extract
description: 50mg of Apigenin (chamomile extract) to reduce pre-sleep anxiety and improve sleep onset.

title: Bedroom Temperature Drop
description: Keep the bedroom temperature between 65-68°F (18-20°C). A drop in core body temperature is required to initiate sleep.

title: Morning Sunlight
description: View sunlight by going outside within 30-60 minutes of waking. Do this for 10-30 minutes to set your circadian clock.

title: Dim & Block Blue Light
description: Dim overhead lights and avoid screens (or wear blue-light blockers) 1-2 hours before bed to prevent melatonin suppression.
